data.title: Kevin & Perry Celebrate 20 Years at Amnesia Ibiza
data.meta_description: In the year 2000, a teen film was released that has since gained cult status among clubbers all over the world, thanks to its soundtrack, humour, Harry
data.text:
- Advertisement -

In the year 2000, a teen film was released that has since gained cult status among clubbers all over the world, thanks to its soundtrack, humour, Harry Enfield and Kathy Burke performances, and references to Ibiza’s rave culture.

It’s hard to believe that over two decades (and a pandemic!) have flown by so how better to celebrate Kevin & Perry’s 20th anniversary than to go back to where it all happened, Amnesia Ibiza.

The pandemic regrettably thwarted the intended celebratory plans, but Kevin and Perry are returning bigger and better than ever, hosting BOTH the Discotheque and Terrace arenas at Amnesia in Ibiza.

Seb Fontaine, the DJ who performed during the actual filming, Judge Jules, the curator of the classic soundtrack, and Lange, the producer and DJ of the “Follow Me” track, will all be performing in the famous Discotheque.

The supercharged Amnesia terrace will be hosted by Ben Nicky’s Emotional Havoc and Paul Taylor’s Retro parties!

Expect a gathering of trance and classic music fans, old school Ibiza faces, and a feel straight out of the 1990s/early 2000s, complete with lasers, strobes, and smoke machines!

Tickets are now on sale athttps://www.ibiza-spotlight.com/ and https://www.amnesia.es/

Lineup:

Monday, June 6

Discotheque (Main Room):

Judge Jules

Seb Fontaine

Lange

Les Schmitz

Terrace:

Ben Nicky (pres. Emotional Havoc)

David Rust

Stephen Kirkwood

Vicky Devine

Tuesday, September 27

Discotheque (Main Room):

Judge Jules

Seb Fontaine

Lange

Sean Hughes

Terrace (hosted by Retro)

Lovely Laura & Ben Santiago

Brandon Block

Paul Taylor

20 Years of Kevin & Perry Go Large – Essential Info

Date: Monday 6th June / Tuesday 27th September

Restrictions: Ages 18+ Only

Location: Amnesia (Main Room and Terrace)
